import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
%matplotlib inline
source.e2098606:
plt.subplot(221)

df['Prime Video'].value_counts().plot(kind='bar', title='Amazon Prime Video', figsize=(16,9))

plt.xticks(rotation=0)

plt.subplot(222)

df['Disney+'].value_counts().plot(kind='bar', title='Disney+')

plt.xticks(rotation=0)

plt.subplot(223)

df['Hulu'].value_counts().plot(kind='bar', title='Hulu')

plt.xticks(rotation=0)

plt.subplot(224)

df['Netflix'].value_counts().plot(kind='bar', title='Netflix')

plt.xticks(rotation=0)

plt.show()

corr = df.corr()
sns.heatmap(corr, annot=True, square=True)
plt.yticks(rotation=2)
plt.show()
source.a2d14aca:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(5,3))
ax.scatter(df["Hulu"], df["Netflix"])
ax.set_xlabel("Hulu")
ax.set_ylabel("Netflix")
plt.show()
source.0da9a544: shape attribute gives the number of rows and columns of the dataset
source.d02bc808: The subplots() function takes three arguments that describes the layout of the figure. The layout is organized in rows and columns
source.639b0499: factorplot is used to represent different types of categorical plot.the type of plot can be specified using 'kind' parameter
source.2fd5cbe4: describe is used to obtain details like mean,percentile,freq etc.
source.d68d65f5: Observation: We can see that Unnamed and Id have similar boxplots with a minimum at 0 and maximum above 8k, median around 5k.There are outliers present at Year, Hulu, Disney plus and Run time
source.d3e261b0: observation: run time between 0 to 100 has highest density
source.05e62cd7: distplot gives as histogram with a line over it.distplot can be used to represent the univariate distribution of data.
source.64226be1: boxplot displays the distribution of data on basis of minimum,maximum,median,first quartile and second quartile.it also indicates whether the data is symmetrical are not.
source.a5808546: annot = True makes sure that the values of each cell appear on the chart and yticks sets the y-axis values
source.eaa8d16f: reading the file into a variable df
source.b269f03e: Observation:here we have drawn bar graph for values count for different OTT platforms.In this graph 0 on x-axis represents non-null values and 1 represents null values present.By this graph we can conclude that Amazon prime video has highest null value count and Hulu has least null value count
source.a71a5d16:
CONCLUSION
Points to be noted for good data visualization: 
1.information have to be simple 
2.headings must be clear so that the reader can understand as soon the person looks at the graph
3.graph must be choosen based on the information and the message to be conveyed
4.3d visualization can be misleading so it should be avoided
source.91aaa501: Observation: The age of 18+  have highest count
source.f4fdf52b: this plots a histogram with width as 10 and height as 12.bins represents the bars of histogram.bins can be changed as per our wish
source.72be20f7: isnull().sum()returns the number of missing values in the data set
